Title: Exploring byte parsing APIs in Go

Subtitle: My experiences as a professional programmer dealing with RSI and cubital tunnel syndrome, and how I manage these issues.

Subtitle: Accessing hardware information using the SMBIOS standard with Go.

Subtitle: Using Go’s unsafe.Pointer type to cast raw memory and work with system calls.

Subtitle: Controlling QEMU and libvirt programmatically using pure Go interfaces.

Subtitle: Lessons learned while working with DigitalOcean’s monolithic Go code repository, cthulhu.
